members.name: SpeechRecognition.SpeechRecognition()
members.description: Creates a new SpeechRecognition object.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.grammars
members.description: Returns and sets a collection of SpeechGrammar objects that represent the grammars that will be understood by the current SpeechRecognition.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.lang
members.description: Returns and sets the language of the current SpeechRecognition. If not specified, this defaults to the HTML lang attribute value, or the user agent's language setting if that isn't set either.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.continuous
members.description: Controls whether continuous results are returned for each recognition, or only a single result. Defaults to single (false.)

members.name: SpeechRecognition.interimResults
members.description: Controls whether interim results should be returned (true) or not (false.) Interim results are results that are not yet final (e.g. the SpeechRecognitionResult.isFinal property is false.)

members.name: SpeechRecognition.maxAlternatives
members.description: Sets the maximum number of SpeechRecognitionAlternatives provided per result. The default value is 1.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.serviceURI
members.description: Specifies the location of the speech recognition service used by the current SpeechRecognition to handle the actual recognition. The default is the user agent's default speech service.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onaudiostart
members.description: Fired when the user agent has started to capture audio.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onaudioend
members.description: Fired when the user agent has finished capturing audio.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onend
members.description: Fired when the speech recognition service has disconnected.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onerror
members.description: Fired when a speech recognition error occurs.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onnomatch
members.description: Fired when the speech recognition service returns a final result with no significant recognition. This may involve some degree of recognition, which doesn't meet or exceed the confidence threshold.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onresult
members.description: Fired when the speech recognition service returns a result — a word or phrase has been positively recognized and this has been communicated back to the app.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onsoundstart
members.description: Fired when any sound — recognisable speech or not — has been detected.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onsoundend
members.description: Fired when any sound — recognisable speech or not — has stopped being detected.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onspeechstart
members.description: Fired when sound that is recognised by the speech recognition service as speech has been detected.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onspeechend
members.description: Fired when speech recognised by the speech recognition service has stopped being detected.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.onstart
members.description: Fired when the speech recognition service has begun listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.abort()
members.description: Stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and doesn't attempt to return a SpeechRecognitionResult.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.start()
members.description: Starts the speech recognition service listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition.

members.name: SpeechRecognition.stop()
members.description: Stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and attempts to return a SpeechRecognitionResult using the audio captured so far.
